content: I am delighted to announce that the Tallinn U of Technology Senate has on 23 Jan 2024 decided to bestow on the University of Calgary professor J. Robin B. Cockett the title of Doctor Honoris Causa of the university. This is for his contributions to advancing the study of mathematical foundations of algorithmics and programming in Tallinn.
Well-deserved. Robin is definitely my biggest influence: his knowledge and research interests are deep and varied.
